```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### What to do for Week 3 after class ends^[For grading.]

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square-check", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
Submit = c(unchecked,
           checked,
           checked,
           unchecked),

Description = c("Review the solution set from the Chapter 2 homework set",
                "Finish the *Introduction to the Tidyverse* module^[It is advised that you complete the *Introduction to R* module first]",
               "Complete problems 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10 and 11 in Chapter 3",
               "Download the in-class Chapter 3 Slideshow"),

Location = c( "[Link](/tasks/02-tasks/#solutions)",
              "[Link](/datacamp/02-module/)",
              "[Link](/tasks/03-tasks/#homework)",
              "[Link](/materials/03-content/#in-class-notes)")
)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em")
```
